name: Steamed Hams - RPG Maker
description: Extremely short (as in under-five-minutes short) rpg based off the infamous "Skinner and the Superintendent" skit (aka S T E A M E D  H A M S) from the Simpsons.  More of a tech demo than anything, but there is some alternate dialogue and bonus stuff you can discover.  It took me two days to make, with another day to finalize everything.  This is a MEME GAME I MADE IN TWO DAYS.  Don't complain to me unless there's a game-breaking bug.
